name: gold & cream/cream & gold handmade crochet flower brooch
description:
Hi there

Welcome to my sale for a handmade crochet flower wool brooch

It measures approx 8 - 9cm in diameter

It comes with a brooch bar with safety catch

Any questions, please do not hesitate to ask, I will be happy to help. Message me if there is a colour in particular that you would like and I would be happy to make it/help if I can.

FREE SHIPPING TO THE UK 
PLEASE ADD TO CART AND CHOOSE YOUR 
COUNTRY TO SEE POSTAGE PRICES FOR OVERSEAS

I do ask for proof of postage on everything I send out but 
I do send by recorded delivery if you prefer that method. 
Please add to cart if required.

Thank you for taking the time to look 
Happy Shopping!! :-)xx

gold & cream with tartan print centre

name: Handmade mini crochet flower brooch - 8 to choose from
description:
Hi there

Welcome to my sale for a handmade crochet flower wool brooch

It measures approx 3 - 4cm in diameter & 5cm long

It comes with a brooch bar with safety catch

There's a choice of 8 different ones

Any questions, please do not hesitate to ask, I will be happy to help. Message me if there is a colour in particular that you would like and I would be happy to make it/help if I can.


FREE SHIPPING TO THE UK 
PLEASE ADD TO CART AND CHOOSE YOUR COUNTRY
TO SEE POSTAGE PRICES FOR OVERSEAS

I do ask for proof of postage on everything I send out but
If you want a guarantee of arrival please choose the recorded delivery option listed 

Thank you for taking the time to look
Happy Shopping!! :-)xx

name: Handmade crocheted hedgehog keyrings and clips - 8 to choose from
description:
Hi there and welcome to my sale for:-

1 handmade crocheted hedgehog
comes in a choice of colours and as
a clip or keyring

normal, afro, multi-bright, red, black, blue, purple, pink

They measure approximately 7 to 8cm in diameter

Perfect for a gift or to just treat yourself.

Any questions, please do not hesitate to ask, I will be happy to help. Message me if there is a colour in particular that you would like and I would be happy to make it/help if I can.

FREE UK POSTAGE 
PLEASE ADD TO CART AND CHOOSE YOUR COUNTRY
TO POSTAGE PRICES FOR OVERSEAS

I do ask for proof of postage on everything I send out but
If you want a guarantee of arrival please choose the recorded delivery option listed 

Thank you for taking the time to look.

Happy shopping!!:))
